name: Bouncy (Jimmy Studio)
description:
A small physic-based puzzle game

The game is pretty simple. Try to shoot the ball to hit all boxes and then falling into the basket. The boxes can be idle or in movement.

Game modes:

- Challenge: there are many levels, player try to pass the level to unlock the next level. Higher level is harder with boxes move in more challenged ways.

- Time attack: in one minute, player try to shoot the ball successfully as many times as possible to get the score. Player would get extra score if shoot many consecutive ball successfully.

Enjoy the game!
